post.title: people of reddit were called redditors. what do we call people of ruqqus?

author.bio:
I'm a real live Mainiac.  That, for the unfamiliar, is someone born and raised in Maine, by parents who where also born and raised in Maine, I ain't a biscuit (Google: Maine, cat and oven).

I currently live in Florida, I'm a Mainiac, not a fool.
author.bio_html:
I'm a real live Mainiac. That, for the unfamiliar, is someone born and raised in Maine, by parents who where also born and raised in Maine, I ain't a biscuit (Google: Maine, cat and oven).

I currently live in Florida, I'm a Mainiac, not a fool.

post.title: people of reddit were called redditors. what do we call people of ruqqus?

body:
It wasn’t farming but those ignorant posts don’t seem to be appearing as often.  

Now everyone wants to pander for rep and it’s foolish to me.  But people aren’t as passionate about their false believe in rep Farming making the site More successful (positive rep).

Isn’t stance on that, and my main Issue with reddit, was the karma whoring.  It promotes group think. Which is bad.  Mostly.  

But the folks here love getting those perks.  So how long until they’re paying for gold stickers and pro-subscriptions.  

Makes people feel powerful and happy for a moment 
, to get those points, doesn’t it.  

Strange to me that they can’t see the effects of it.   

The top comments aren’t even the best ones here, they’re usually just a flippant offhand comment. While far below that will be a comment worth noting.
body_html:
It wasn’t farming but those ignorant posts don’t seem to be appearing as often.

Now everyone wants to pander for rep and it’s foolish to me. But people aren’t as passionate about their false believe in rep Farming making the site More successful (positive rep).

Isn’t stance on that, and my main Issue with reddit, was the karma whoring. It promotes group think. Which is bad. Mostly.

But the folks here love getting those perks. So how long until they’re paying for gold stickers and pro-subscriptions.

Makes people feel powerful and happy for a moment , to get those points, doesn’t it.

Strange to me that they can’t see the effects of it.

The top comments aren’t even the best ones here, they’re usually just a flippant offhand comment. While far below that will be a comment worth noting.

post.title: people of reddit were called redditors. what do we call people of ruqqus?

body:
My bosses are incompetent greedy yes man and yet I’m still with the company. 

The devs don’t have the background and knowledge I have and so they won’t remove the voting system.  And since the voting dictates popular opinion (and unpopular opinion forums) the argument won’t be heard.  

The majority are high functioning mentally retarded and unread.

They’d need a really funny meme or twitter screen shot or a popular tik tok user to convince them of the truth.
body_html:
My bosses are incompetent greedy yes man and yet I’m still with the company.

The devs don’t have the background and knowledge I have and so they won’t remove the voting system. And since the voting dictates popular opinion (and unpopular opinion forums) the argument won’t be heard.

The majority are high functioning mentally retarded and unread.

They’d need a really funny meme or twitter screen shot or a popular tik tok user to convince them of the truth.
